title: camper space for rent
posting_body: Camper RV space for rent with 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom fully functional kitchen and lots of storage space inside.
There is a queen size mattress with a tv.
Also has a dinette table that converts down to a bed and 2 twin size bunk beds in the back.
Rent will be $700 and will include water, electric, HEAT/AIR and wifi, also there will be access to a shared washer/dryer.
You will have plenty of yard space all to yourself as well.
There will be a $300 deposit and you can be able to get it fully refunded after leasing agreement if place is still the same after moving out.
This place is in a nice area and you will have privacy to yourself.
You will be around 10-15 min or closer to many different shopping areas such as ALDI, walmart, LIDL, Kroger and many others.
There is also many different eateries in the area as well that are close by.
You will also be about 12-15 min from the Stone Mountain park and about 25-30 min from downtown Atlanta.
Also we will not allow pets or kids due to it being a small area to live in but comfortable enough for one person.
and you can email me or message me.
